name: Miyamoto Musashi
achievements: Famed for his duels, including against Sasaki Kojiro
Founder of the Niten Ichi-ryū school of swordsmanship
quote: In battle, if you make your opponent flinch, you have already won.

name: William Marshall
title: The Greatest Knight
achievements: Famed for his martial prowess and chivalry
Regent of England during the minority of Henry III
quote: The road to success is not easy to navigate, but with hard work, drive, and passion, it's possible to achieve the American dream.
